item.title: Global Healthcare Worker Shortage
item.description: ![](news photo about healthcare,shortage,global –ar 2:13.webp) Global Healthcare Worker Shortage There is a global shortage of healthcare workers, and it is having a significant impact on the quality of care that patients receive. In the UK, for example, there are 100,000 fewer doctors than are needed.
